DGACM.relevance_comment: Requests UN‑Habitat to finalize preparatory and organizational arrangements for the fiftieth‑anniversary commemoration and explicitly "requests the Secretary‑General to support the commemoration". DGACM’s PPB shows the Department is responsible for conference management, protocol, host‑country liaison and provision of Secretariat support for meetings and special events (see para. 2.1(a),(c),(d); executive direction and management paras. 2.201–2.203; and the various subprogrammes on planning and meetings). Operationally, DGACM would implement the Secretary‑General’s "support" by providing conference‑servicing, logistical and protocol arrangements and processing related documentation for the event.

Decides to hold a two‑day high‑level meeting of the General Assembly on the midterm review of the New Urban Agenda and "requests the President of the Assembly, in consultation with Member States and UN‑Habitat, to finalize the preparatory process and organizational arrangements for the meeting" and asks that the President submit an agreed declaration for adoption. DGACM’s PPB identifies the Department as the Secretariat unit that facilitates and provides the procedural, conference‑servicing and organizational arrangements for General Assembly meetings and high‑level events (see para. 2.1(a),(c); subprogramme 2 planning and coordination paras. 2.33, 2.207; and executive direction paras. 2.201–2.203). Thus this paragraph creates Secretariat/organizational tasks that DGACM implements (meeting planning, rooming, interpretation/translation/publishing and protocol support).

"Requests the Secretary‑General to submit a progress report to the General Assembly at its eighty‑first session on the implementation of the present resolution..." DGACM’s PPB includes responsibility for substantive servicing of the General Assembly, production and issuance of parliamentary documentation, and dissemination (see subprogramme 1 paras. 2.19–2.21 and subprogramme 3 documentation services paras. 2.45–2.53). DGACM would therefore implement parts of the Secretary‑General’s submission by processing, preparing multilingual versions, publishing and issuing the requested report and related documentation for the Assembly.

"Decides... to include in the provisional agenda of its eighty‑first session the item entitled 'Follow‑up to the implementation of the New Urban Agenda and strengthening of UN‑Habitat'." Inclusion of an item in the Assembly agenda triggers Secretariat actions (agenda preparation, scheduling, documentation and servicing). DGACM’s mandate covers facilitation and substantive/technical secretariat support to the General Assembly and its agenda items (see para. 2.1(a) and subprogramme 1 paras. 2.19–2.21), so DGACM would carry out the practical Secretariat work required to place the item on the provisional agenda and service the subsequent meetings.
